education.description: Here I took my first step into the Technology Field not having any knowledge in coding. I learned everything there is to know about Web Development. I'm proficient in the front-end part of web development, the back-end is little bit in progress.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Physical Therapy
education.description: I only studied for a year and had to stop to immigrate here in the United States

work.title: Lead Technician, Narotics Technician, Shipping Technician
work.description: When I was Lead Technician, I was in charge of 5 departments and making sure the deliveries were out in time. Got awarded once as an Employee of the Month

work.title: Patient Care Technician
work.description: As a Patient Care Technician, my role was to provide direct and indirect health care to patients by assisting with medical treatments and basic daily needs, monitoring their health, and performing basic nursing procedures.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That James Dabajo must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
